com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core

Interface I18NMessageBuilder.SecondStep

  • Enclosing class:
    I18NMessageBuilder

    public static interface I18NMessageBuilder.SecondStep
    Second optional step in this fluent builder.

    The developer have 2 possibilities in this step:

    • First complete the message process with the method build() which will then return the value and
    • second add additional arguments which will then injected into the value from the key.
    Since:
    0.1.0-PRERELEASE
    Version:
    0.6.0
    Author:
    Naoghuman

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      I18NMessageBuilder.LastStep arguments(Object... arguments)
      Setter for additional arguments which will injected into the value from the previous defined key.
      String build()
      Completes the previous configuration steps and returned the corresponding value.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        String build()
        Completes the previous configuration steps and returned the corresponding value.

        Hint:
        Before the access to the value will be performed an internal check will be done if the ResourceBundle (configured in I18NResourceBundleBuilder) with the acutal parameters baseBundleName and actualLocale can be loaded. If not a MissingResourceException will be thrown.

        Returns:
        the loaded value.
        Since:
        0.1.0-PRERELEASE
        See Also:
        I18NResourceBundle.actualLocaleProperty(), I18NResourceBundleBuilder, MissingResourceException, ResourceBundle

      • arguments

        I18NMessageBuilder.LastStep arguments(Object... arguments)
        Setter for additional arguments which will injected into the value from the previous defined key.

        For the injecting from the arguments into the value from the ResourceBundle the class MessageFormat.format(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object...) will be used to format the returned message.

        Parameters:
        arguments - which should be injected into the value.
        Returns:
        The last step in this fluent builder.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if arguments is NULL.
        IllegalArgumentException - if arguments is EMPTY.
        Since:
        0.1.0-PRERELEASE
        See Also:
        MessageFormat.format(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object...), ResourceBundle
